Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero (Congress)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero (Congress) due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero (Congress) due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#54 Cicero

#53 Pulaski

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
